reviews.review_msg: I had to get my course regraded after I took it with Jade. My grade went up from a B+ to an A, I can only feel that she was grading me harshly because she did not agree with my opinions on education. I made sure not to take another class with her, as getting the regrade was time-consuming. If you are left-leaning, take her course; otherwise, avoid.

If you get the chance to take a class with Jade, DO IT. Easily one of the best profs. Super passionate, actually cares about students, and makes the class feel like a community. Assignments are creative and let you explore topics that matter to you. If you're into activism, migration, or social justice, you'll love this class. 10000/10 recommend!

Jade's classes are amazing and her teaching style is very unique and that well integrates concepts learned. Her making and grading criteria is very organized with great feedback. She is really friendly and cares a lot about her students. Always available when needed help and also responds to emails very quick. Loved her class!!
